LanguageData.VFEM2_HeraldicRugNarrow.label: heraldic rug (narrow)
LanguageData.VFEM2_HeraldicRugNarrow.description: A narrow decorative rug featuring a bold heraldic design, perfect for displaying allegiance or family pride in any room.
LanguageData.VFEM2_HeraldicRugBroad.label: heraldic rug (broad)
LanguageData.VFEM2_HeraldicRugBroad.description: A large decorative rug featuring a bold heraldic design, perfect for displaying allegiance or family pride in any room.
LanguageData.VFEM2_HeraldicRugGrand.label: heraldic rug (grand)
LanguageData.VFEM2_HeraldicRugGrand.description: A massive decorative rug featuring a bold heraldic design, perfect for displaying allegiance or family pride in any room.
